data.title: Life.Church Oklahoma City
data.meta_description: Life.Church is passionate about sharing the love of Christ by caring for each other and serving our Oklahoma City community.
data.text:
No matter who you are or where you’ve been, you’re welcome here.

At Life.Church, you'll be welcomed into a friendly, casual environment by people who are excited to see you. All you have to do from here is come as you are and find out more for yourself!

Serve at Life.Church Oklahoma City

One of the best ways to meet people, develop relationships, and grow as a follower of Christ is to serve the local church. And it’s not just on the weekends! Serving opportunities are available seven days a week.

Love Your Neighbor

Jesus calls us to love our neighbors as ourselves, and we’re all about it. As you pursue God’s calling on your life, we want to help you love your neighbors and take action on the causes you care about most.
